field.name: partyId
field.description: The Party the content is for

field.name: partyId
field.description: The Party the email was sent to, for different emails sent to different parties associated with an order

field.name: processingStatusId
field.description: Sub-status for use when statusId=OrderProcessing for custom pre-approve status flows

field.name: terminalId
field.description: ID for the terminal, such as a POS system, where the order was recorded

field.name: displayId
field.description: ID to display to customers, can be different from orderId and/or externalId

field.name: externalId
field.description: ID for the order in the direct upstream system it came from if it came from an external system

field.name: originId
field.description: ID for the order in the original system it came from (system of record) if not the direct upstream system

field.name: originUrl
field.description: URL to view the order on the original system it came from

field.name: parentOrderId
field.description: The original/parent order this is based on, used for all order clones including recurring orders

field.name: recurCronExpression
field.description: If populated is a recurring order, automatically cloned if in Approved status

field.name: lastOrderedDate
field.description: For recurring orders the date/time of the most recent clone/recurrence

field.name: recurAutoInvoice
field.description: If Y and cloned recurring order successfully auto-approved then also invoice/bill the order immediately

field.name: statusId
field.description: OrderHeader status the decision is meant for

field.name: productParameterSetId
field.description: For a set of Product Parameters to personalize a Product and/or record details specific to a purchase of the Product. If used represents a distinct Product instance (OrderItem, etc records should not be combined unless matches).

field.name: priority
field.description: NOTE: this may be deprecated in favor of OrderPart.priority

field.name: unitAmount
field.description: The purchase or sales price. For barter/exchange orders this represents the market value of the item at the time of the exchange in terms of the OrderHeader.currencyUomId.

field.name: standardCost
field.description: For purchase orders the cost for accounting purposes if different from unitAmount. Used to set Asset.acquireCost on receipt.

field.name: fromAssetId
field.description: Order for a particular Asset, not just any associated with the Product.

field.name: promoQuantity
field.description: For promo items. The quantity of the parent order item 'consumed' by the promotion, excluding from use in other promotions if promotion set to limit by this.

field.name: promoTimesUsed
field.description: For promo items. The number of times the promo was used for use limits.

field.name: promoCodeText
field.description: Promo code(s) entered by customer used for the item, may be from external system

field.name: finAccountId
field.description: Populate along with finAccountTransId for gift card/certificate/etc purchase and replenishment

field.name: overrideGlAccountId
field.description: Used to specify the override or actual glAccountId used for the item.

field.name: sourcePercentage
field.description: The percentage used for tax, promo, etc items

field.name: amountAlreadyIncluded
field.description: The amount here is already represented in the item price, such as VAT taxes.

field.name: exemptAmount
field.description: An amount that would normally apply, but not to this order; for tax exemption represents the what the tax would have been.

field.name: customerReferenceId
field.description: For tax entries this is partyTaxId

field.name: shipmentId
field.description: For physical items the assetIssuanceId can be used to find the Shipment but for adjustments and such, possibly prorated for a particular Shipment, this is the way to find it.

field.name: partyId
field.description: The Party who the FormResponse information is for or about

field.name: vendorPartyId
field.description: The vendor (seller) of the items in the order part.

field.name: customerPartyId
field.description: The customer (buyer) of the items in the order part.

field.name: facilityId
field.description: The Facility to fulfill the order from (if null look up from ProductStore), or for purchase orders the Facility the order will be shipped to.

field.name: settlementTermId
field.description: Settlement (payment) term for auto order payments and set on Invoice(s) based on this OrderPart

field.name: priority
field.description: Numeric priority, 1 to 9 where 1 is highest priority and 9 is lowest priority (like a to do list), defaults to 5

field.name: requiredWork
field.description: If Y require WorkEffort Status of Complete, Closed, or Cancelled to consider OrderItem fulfilled

field.name: forStatusId
field.description: Task must be Complete or Closed before change to this status (soft rule, depending on code in place)

field.name: paymentMethodId
field.description: Customer PaymentMethod to refund to, override original

field.name: useSingleRefundPayment
field.description: If Y create a single refund Payment, otherwise look for Credit Card order payments and refund first against those

field.name: postalContactMechId
field.description: If customer is internal org is shipment destination, otherwise is origin

field.name: telecomContactMechId
field.description: If customer is internal org is shipment destination, otherwise is origin

field.name: facilityId
field.description: If customer is internal org is shipment origin, otherwise is destination

field.name: shipmentMethodEnumId
field.description: Only needed for generating a return label, can also be specified on return shipment

field.name: carrierPartyId
field.description: Only needed for generating a return label, can also be specified on return shipment

field.name: displayId
field.description: ID to display to customers, can be different from returnId and/or externalId

field.name: externalId
field.description: ID for the return in the direct upstream system it came from if it came from an external system

field.name: originId
field.description: ID for the return in the original system it came from if not the direct upstream system

field.name: responseImmediate
field.description: Process response immediately (Y) or wait for returned inventory (N)

field.name: inventoryStatusId
field.description: If specified the status of received inventory (for resell, damaged, etc)

field.name: returnQuantity
field.description: Quantity promised by customer

field.name: receivedQuantity
field.description: Quantity actually received from customer

field.name: responseAmount
field.description: Total response amount, independent of quantity. Manually set before response processes to use the given amount, otherwise calculated during process response from received/return quantity * returnPrice (defaults to OrderItem.unitAmount)

field.name: externalId
field.description: ID for the return item in the direct upstream system it came from if it came from an external system
